## kubemqctl config

Run Kubemqctl configuration wizard command

### Synopsis

Config command allows to set Kubemqctl configuration with a wizard

```
kubemqctl config [flags]
```

### Examples

```

	# Run Kubemqctl configuration wizard
	# kubemqctl config

```

